response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its value and the benefits it provides, I believe it would be a great asset for you. Considering its worth to both parties, I propose a price of $12,000 for this exceptional product. This offer allows us to find a balance between maximizing my return on investment and ensuring you receive a valuable item at a reasonable cost. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both of us.", "product_price": 12000}
